{"id":1520369091,"question_id":1732,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1737834797,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1520369091/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum One Bit Operations to Make Integers Zero","memory":"7.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumOneBitOperations(int n) {//0 <= n <= 10^9\n        if(n<=1)\n            return n;\n        int bit = 0;\n        while((1<<bit)<=n)\n            bit++;\n        return ( (1<<bit)-1 ) - minimumOneBitOperations( n - (1<<(bit-1)));\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-one-bit-operations-to-make-integers-zero","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
